overview: The lure of Thailand's Ladyboys is so strong that many men will leave behind everything and everyone they know to be with them. This fascinating series follows two expats, Scott and David, and their ladyboy loves. Scott moves to Thailand to join his fianc√©, Paeng, after a three year long-distance relationship. David introduces his ladyboy girlfriend, Annie, to his son and insists he is straight.
title: Ladyboys: Inside Thailand's Third Gender
